description: This source file implements the core functionalities of the Slap Env Controller Object for the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP) system. It includes functions for creating, initializing, enrolling objects, and removing the controller. The file sets up various interfaces, manages internal data structures, and provides the fundamental object lifecycle management required for SLAP environment control.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapEcoCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new Slap Env Controller Object, setting up its member functions and properties, then enrolls and initializes contained objects.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapEcoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the Slap Env Controller Object, freeing associated resources and interfaces.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapEcoEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Sets up required interfaces and internal objects for the SLAs environment, allocating memory and initializing properties as needed.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapEcoInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the Slap Env Controller Object, setting default property values and preparing internal data structures.
